boardgame.name: Toledo
Τολέδο
boardgame.description: In Toledo players try to forge magnificent swords and bring them into the fortress of the city, the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Alcazar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo;._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player can send his five helpers on the map and on to the roads of Toledo, in order to acquire steel and jewels from dealers. Thus they get swords manufactured at the most famous armorer in the city. Afterwards those swords are to be delivered to Alcazar._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In addition there are two taverns (at which one _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;refuels_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; cards) as well as a place where the works of art of the resident painter, El Greco, are available._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There is a lot to discover in Toledo._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Toledo Mayfair Games #4110 2008 Complete, components are in excellent condition (game has only been played once). Includes rules book; game board; 20 playing pieces (5 each in 4 player colors); 32 business tiles (8 each in 4 player colors); 90 game cards (84 movement cards and 6 El Greco paintings); 16 skill tiles (12 fencing skill tiles, 4 move skill tiles); 19 sword tiles; 23 steel counters (actually, cardboard...); 20 gems; plastic box insert. Box is in excellent condition. (19)

_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;In Toledo players try to forge magnificent swords and bring them into the fortress of the city, the “Alcazar”. Each player can send his five helpers on the map and on to the roads of Toledo, in order to acquire steel and jewels from dealers. Thus they get swords manufactured at the most famous armorer in the city. Afterwards those swords are to be delivered to Alcazar. In addition there are two taverns (at which one “refuels” cards) as well as a place where the works of art of the resident painter, El Greco, are available. There is a lot to discover in Toledo._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; -BoardGameGeek
